name: Paraffin Wax
description: A versatile wax used in packaging, candle making, and more.

name: Fully Refined Paraffin Wax
description: Highly purified wax for food-grade and medical applications.

name: Semi-Refined Wax
description: Ideal for industrial applications with moderate oil content.

name: Microcrystalline Wax
description: Used in cosmetics, adhesives, and chewing gum for its flexibility and tackiness.
